target.description: Calculate the volume of a sphere given its radius.
target.name: calculate_sphere_volume

target.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given the base and height.
target.name: calculate_triangle_area

target.code:
from sympy import sqrt

def calculate_area_of_triangle_from_sides(a, b, c):
    s = (a + b + c) / 2
    area = sqrt(s * (s - a) * (s - b) * (s - c))
    return area
target.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its three sides using Heron's formula.
target.name: calculate_area_of_triangle_from_sides

target.description: Calculates the volume of a cone given its radius and height.

target.description: Calculates the area of a circle given its radius.

target.description: Calculate the surface area of a cylinder given its radius and height.
